name: LiveAutographs
overview:
LiveAutographs.com provide you with a personalized celebrity video message and autographed memorabilia.

Autograph sports and celebrity memorabilia is a $1 billion/year business in the U.S. alone, however up to 90% of it is counterfeit. LiveAutographs are guaranteed to be authentic as they take a video of the celebrity writing the message and place it on their website.

LiveAutographs removes the restrictions of time, travel and luck — allowing fans to ask questions, interact with their favorite artist, television or film star or athlete, while purchasing authentic autographed merchandise.

Live Autographs, Inc. was acquired by Availor Partners, LP and has been subsequently merged with Legacy Connect.

Legacy Connect is a for-profit business aiming to change how the world interacts with philanthropy and charitable fundraising by leveraging media and celebrity relationships on an engaging online platform where consumers can make a meaningful difference in what matters to them. By combining technology, media, celebrity and corporate sponsorship in a rewarding and incentivizing platform, Legacy hopes to help charities raise substantially more money, faster and more cost effectively.
